title: Gary Lineker will abide by BBC guidelines until review completed - Tim Davie
content: This video can not be playedThe BBC's director general Tim Davie has said that Gary Lineker has agreed to abide by the corporation's editorial guidelines until a review has been completed.Mr Davie was speaking to the BBC's Media Correspondent David Sillito, following a weekend of disrupted programming as many sports pundits and presenters pulled out of programmes in solidarity with Mr Lineker.
